creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on back, in pencil: [B-856/2], [24] and [Sabatelli]
markings:
Watermark: Fleur-de-lis in a crowned shield, above [4 / V]; close to Heawood 1835 (London, 1775)

on back, on plastic label: [S17]
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash, heightened with white on paper
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; given to MIA)
title: Infant Pyrrhus before Glaucias [?]
